lead_paragraph: Billy Bob Thornton, the actor of dark, psychological films such as "Sling Blade" and "A Simple Plan," takes a turn on the small screen as a laconic hit man in a TV adaptation of 1996 Oscar-winning black comedy "Fargo."

headline.main: A Minute With: Billy Bob Thornton on Recasting Himself for TV
headline.print_headline: A Minute With: Billy Bob Thornton on Recasting Himself for TV
